H0.text: Who invented the lightning rod. Benjamin Franklin

H1.text: Who invented the lightning rod. Nikola Tesla

H2.text: Who invented the lightning rod. Alessandro Volta

H3.text: Who invented the lightning rod. Franklinic

A4.text: Franklin's electrical experiments led to his invention of the lightning rod.

A5.text: Following a series of experiments on Franklin's own house, lightning rods were installed on the Academy of Philadelphia (later the University of Pennsylvania) and the Pennsylvania State House (later Independence Hall) in 1752.
